item.description:
We're going to have a typical American cook out. Let's get together to kick back and enjoy the end of summer. We'll fire up the grill and fill our bellies with some summer-y delectables.

We'll can relax outside in the yard (or head inside if the bugs get too bad). The evening's entertainment is also potluck. Have a fun game? Bring it! Play guitar? Serenade us! Know any scary ghost stories? Tell 'em!

When you RSVP, please mention what you'll bring. Also, it's BYOB (bring-your-own-beer/booze). Here are some suggestions:

Appetizer -
Hamburgers - Noelle
Hamburger buns -Kay (Middlesex group)
Hot dogs/buns - Jeanne (Italian group), Suzanne(Middlesex group)
Chicken - Sal (Italian group)
Veggie kabobs - Brett (Italian group)
Macaroni salad - Zele (Euro group)
Potato salad - Tiza (Euro Group), Christina (Italian group)
Tossed salad - Cheryl (Italian group)
Orzo salad - Kay
Fruit -
Side dish - Bev (Italian group), Kathy (Euro group)
Dessert - Marina (Euro group), Jeff (Euro group)
Soda - Bev (Italian group)
Paper plates/napkins - Noelle
Cups/Plastic utensils - Noelle

This is a joint event with the Northern Middlesex Meetup and the Eastern Italian Language and Culture Meetup.
item.how_to_find_us: Will send out address closer to date of event

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: End of Summer Cook Out
